summary_gpt: Mayur Uniquoters Limited has announced a board meeting scheduled for May 8, 2025, to approve its audited financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2025, and to consider dividend recommendations. The company has also maintained a trading window closure for insiders until 48 hours after the results are announced.

Mayur Uniquoters Limited has scheduled a conference call on May 9, 2025, to discuss its audited standalone and consolidated financial results for Q4 FY25 and the full financial year, along with future outlooks. The call will involve management and is accessible via dial-in numbers and a registration link.
